programme.title: Critical Mass

programme.title: Shooting Gallery
programme.desc: SIG Sauer hosts the first ever everyday championship, where new shooters can train and compete in real-world shooting scenarios.

programme.title: Shooting USA
programme.desc: It's an update on the continued success of Armageddon Gear, producing all American made soft goods for shooters. They are now into a new phase for the company, expanding into heirloom quality hunting equipment with AG Hunt. Then concluding the series of Hornady Reloading tips for the novice, this time it is storage and data. And, the Grace Laster story, finding healing in the shooting sports.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild
programme.desc: We are in the outback of Australia … where everything is trying to kill you. It's the Monsoon season, when no one attempts to roam around with salt water crocodiles lurking. Mario links up with long time friend in search of a wild buffalo and he attempts to cook an amazing South American inspired dish in the middle of nowhere.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Learn to make carne adovada with Andrew Zimmern's easy tips for butchering and braising wild hog shoulder with chiles, vinegar and Mexican oregano over an open fire.

programme.title: Survival Science
programme.desc: In this exciting episode we’ll find out the reasons why tree stand accidents happen and how we can prevent them. Cool science mixed with dynamic experiments send our hosts, our stunt team, and our special crash test dummies plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: Fight To Survive
programme.desc: In an isolated mountain river, Fisherman Dean Ririe becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder in water up to his neck. In icy waters that should kill a man, Dean fights for his life miles from help.

programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures TV
programme.desc: Steve West hosts Marc Womac and his Sub 7 crew at the Ponderosa Ranch for spring turkey season to test the CVA scout .410 shotguns and the Pendleton Ammo TSS shells - then Travis Price fills his turkey tag on an Oregon gobbler.

programme.title: Hoge Wild
programme.desc: Lucas and Bill Petrus are back where it all started, chasing easterns in Lexington, TN and Nashville, TN.

programme.title: Realtree Outdoors
programme.desc: Team Realtree hunt the river bottoms of Northeast Oklahoma.
